comments: Digital roots of the nonzero square triangular numbers. - _Ant King_, Jan 21 2012Continued fraction expansion of A176019. - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 08 2012Exp( Sum_{n >= 1} a(n-1)*x^n/n ) = 1 + x + 5*x^2 + 5*x^3 + 15*x^4 + 15*x^5 + ... is the o.g.f. for A189976 (taken with an offset of 0). - _Peter Bala_, Mar 13 2015
